headline: Mosaic Announces Agreement for Sale of Potash Mining Operations in Brazil to VL Mineração
summary: TAMPA, FL / ACCESS Newswire / August 13, 2025 / The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) announced today that it has entered into an agreement to sell Mosaic Potassio Mineração Ltda (MPM), the entity that operates the Taquari-Vassouras potash mine located in ...
